region-dict.title: Applicable Regions
region-dict.description: Puts the check on the defined regions. No definition will result with presence in all regions.

state.title: State
state.description: State of the check of the region. Used only to make it correctly visible in the SlapOS Master UI if no other parameters are defined.

check-frontend-ip-list.title: Frontend IPs to check
check-frontend-ip-list.description: List of default frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used. Defaults to region configuration.

check-certificate-expiration-days.title: Certificate Expiration Check (days)
check-certificate-expiration-days.description: Amount of days to consider certificate as being to-be-expired.

check-maximum-elapsed-time.title: Maximum Elapsed Check (seconds)
check-maximum-elapsed-time.description: Maximum elapsed time for a site to reply to be considered good.

check-http-header-dict.title: HTTP Header Check
check-http-header-dict.description: JSON object of expected HTTP header, like {"Cache-Control": "max-age=3600, public", "Vary": "Accept-Encoding"}. Note: Shall be expressed directly as object, without any additional qouting.

failure-amount.title: Failure Amount
failure-amount.description: Amount of failures to consider URL as in bad state, can be set to higher value for endpoints with accepted short outages.

check-frontend-ip-list.title: Frontend IPs to check (backward compatibility)
check-frontend-ip-list.description: List of Frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used. Defaults to region configuration. Note: This is backward compatibility, use region-dict's check-frontend-ip-list to ensure specific check on each region.
